resources.string: Please check your email and password.

Please insert an email and password to register.
Please insert a password to register.
Please insert an email to register.
Password must be at least 8 characters and should have at least one letter and one number or special characters (!@#$%*)
Aptoide needs your email to make an account
An error occurred. Please try again
Could not login with Google. Please check your Google account (you may need to validate your email address)
Could not login with Google. Please try again.
Could not login with Facebook. Please check your Facebook account (you may need to validate your email address)
Could not login with Facebook. Please try again.
The e-mail address is not valid
That store name is invalid, you can only use letters, numbers or dashes.
This user already has a valid store.
That store name must be at least 3 characters long.
That store name is already taken, you need to choose another one.
Invalid name given for your store. The name of a store can only have alphanumeric characters (A to Z and 0 to 9) or hyphens (-), and it cannot start nor end with a hyphen.
A store already exists with the same name. Please give another name for your store.
The email provided already exists in Aptoide
The email provided does not exist in Aptoide yet
The store could not be created. Please try again.
Daily limit of created users reached for today. If you need this limit increased please contact support at support@aptoide.com or create more users tomorrow
Either email or password are not valid to login (upon name update)
Please wait, we are uploading the photo. This might take a while.

Your friends are now able to follow you and see your shares on Apps Timeline!
allows people to follow their friends and family
With Apps Timeline you can share app recommendations and articles with your followers, seeing what you share.
